Class Board

java.lang.Object
  Board

public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

The board stores spaces and provides access to them to main.

Constructor Detail

Board

public Board(java.util.Scanner scan,
             Die d)
Constructor. Initialize the board and set each space based on a Gaussian random number.

Parameters:
scan - the Scanner object reading the file.
d - the die used for the game.
